Class VersionChangerFactory

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.change.VersionChangerFactory
public class VersionChangerFactory extends Object
Factory for creating VersionChanger instances.

This factory must be initialized with a Maven Model, a mutable POM reader MutableXMLStreamReader and a Log before creating changers.

Since:
15-Sep-2010 16:05:27
Author:
Stephen Connolly

  • Method Details

    • getModel

      public org.apache.maven.model.Model getModel()
      Returns the Maven model currently set on this factory.
      Returns:
      the configured Model, never null after proper initialization

    • setModel

      public void setModel(org.apache.maven.model.Model model)
      Sets the Maven model to be used by changers produced by this factory.
      Parameters:
      model - the Model to set; must not be null

    • getPom

      public MutableXMLStreamReader getPom()
      Returns the mutable POM XML reader currently set on this factory.
      Returns:
      the configured MutableXMLStreamReader

    • setPom

      public void setPom(MutableXMLStreamReader pom)
      Sets the mutable POM XML reader to be used by changers produced by this factory.
      Parameters:
      pom - the MutableXMLStreamReader to set; must not be null

    • getLog

      public org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log getLog()
      Returns the logger currently set on this factory.
      Returns:
      the configured Log

    • setLog

      public void setLog(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log)
      Sets the logger to be used by changers produced by this factory.
      Parameters:
      log - the Log to set; must not be null

    • newPluginVersionChanger

      public VersionChanger newPluginVersionChanger()
      Creates a PluginVersionChanger configured with the factory's state.
      Returns:
      a new PluginVersionChanger
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the factory has not been fully initialized

    • newDependencyVersionChanger

      public VersionChanger newDependencyVersionChanger()
      Creates a DependencyVersionChanger configured with the factory's state.
      Returns:
      a new DependencyVersionChanger
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the factory has not been fully initialized

      Returns:
      a new ParentVersionChanger
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the factory has not been fully initialized

    • newVersionChanger

      public VersionChanger newVersionChanger()
      Creates a composite VersionChanger that will process parent, project, dependencies and plugins (in that order) using the factory's state.
      Returns:
      a new CompositeVersionChanger
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the factory has not been fully initialized

    • newVersionChanger

      public VersionChanger newVersionChanger(boolean processParent, boolean processProject, boolean processDependencies, boolean processPlugins)
      Creates a composite VersionChanger that includes only the requested processors.
      Parameters:
      processParent - if true include a ParentVersionChanger
      processProject - if true include a ProjectVersionChanger
      processDependencies - if true include a DependencyVersionChanger
      processPlugins - if true include a PluginVersionChanger
      Returns:
      a new CompositeVersionChanger composed of the selected changers
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the factory has not been fully initialized
